full_text: Screened by NARA 8/24/2023 13 DR. VED PRAKASH X-RAY CLINIC DR. (BRIG) D.N. PANJIAR M.B.B.S., D.M.R.E., M.D. (Radio Diagnosis) 48-HANUMAN ROAD, NEW DELHI-110 001 FORMERLY : Consultant Radiologist, Indian Army. TELEPHONE : 311000 Professor & Head of Dept. of Radiology, Indira Gandhi Institute of Medical Sciences, Patna. DR. B. S. KAPOOR M.B.B.S., D.M.R.D., M.D. (Radio Diagnosis) 27th March, 1989 MRS. MOHINDER KAUR. PASSPORT NO. B-118500 (Ref. by Dr. Khosla) This is to certify that I have examined today the chest of Mrs. Mohinder Kaur by roentgenological means and who has been identified by her passport No B-118500 and who has signed this form in my presence. I do not find evidence of any lesion of the parenchyma of either lung. The hila, the pleura, the costophrenic angles, the diaphragms and the cardiac shadow are all normal. Conclusion. Chest is Normal. specimen signature. DR D.N.PANJIAR
